short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds menstrual hygiene products everywhere toilet paper appears in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds “menstrual hygiene products” everywhere “toilet paper” appears in your browser, for free – just like it should be in the real world!  Handles phrases like “toilet tissue” and “TP” as well.  Is your workplace or institution TP&MHP?  If not, why not?  Other languages forthcoming.

Background art is Andy Warhol’s “Sunset”.  Hoping for a new day.

Yes - this is intentionally filed under “accessibility”.
